title: 2 BD, Resident social lounge, Private balcony or patio
posting_body: Maris at Martinez is your everyday escape, ideally nestled in the hills of the East Bay.
Our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments feature gorgeous spaces designed for high-end style and comfort.
Modern finishes are sleek and chic throughout the home, while energy-efficient appliances and an in-home washer and dryer effortlessly keep chores under control.

Upgraded interior-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, electric range, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Large closets with extra storage-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Private balcony or patio
